headline: Equifax (NYSE:EFX) Launches New Mobile App Empowering Consumers To Monitor Financial Health
summary: Equifax (NYSE:EFX) recently launched its myEquifax mobile app, enabling users to manage their credit more effectively with new features like secure authentication and educational resources. This launch coincided with a significant 24.81% increase in the company's stock price over the last month. The company's announcement of a 28% increase in quarterly dividends and a significant share repurchase program further could have added to investor interest. These favorable developments occurred amid...

headline: Allot to Report Q1 Earnings: What's in the Offing for the Stock?
summary: ALLT's revenues in the first quarter of 2025 are anticipated to have decreased compared to the prior year, with the net loss potentially widening.

headline: Equifax Introduces myEquifax™ Mobile Application To Help Consumers Better Monitor Their Financial Health
summary: Equifax® (NYSE: EFX) has introduced a new myEquifax™ mobile application for Android™ and iPhone®, offering consumers a convenient way to monitor their financial health from their mobile devices. In the app, users can directly view their Equifax credit report as well as manage existing credit freezes and fraud alerts.
